content: ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved porthos v 1 page 1/3 porthos musketeer socks - by caoua coffee pattern chart set-up for heel flap rs * k2 p2 twice k2 p2tog p2 p2tog repeat once from * k2 p2 twice k2 turn ws sl yf p1 * k2 p2 twice k2tog twice p2 repeat once from * k2 p2 twice turn the heel is worked back and forth over the 34 sts you just worked on the ws row put the other 38sts on hold they will be worked later for instep heel flap rs sl yb k1 sl yb p1 8 times sl yb k1 turn ws sl yf p1 k2 p2 8 times turn work theses two row 19 times all together 38 row total turn heel rs sl yb k to end turn ws sl yf p18 p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb k5 ssk k1 turn ws sl yf purl to 1 st before gap p2tog p1 turn rs sl yb knit to 1 st before gap ssk k1 turn repeat theses last 2 row until all sts have been worked now 20 heel sts remain gusset setup pick up and knit 20 sts along side of heel flap pick up one more st between flap and instep and knit this one continue by knitting all the 38 held instep sts in pattern as established for each instep row you work pattern sts 11-16 then 1-16 twice then pick up 1 st between instep and heel flap and knit it pick up 20 more sts along side of heel flap and knit them knit the 41 other sole sts this is the new beginning of the round now you have 62 sole sts and 38 instep sts ©caoua coffee 2012 pattern is for non-commercial personal use only all rights reserved porthos v 1 page 2/3 porthos musketeer socks - by caoua coffee gusset decrease round 1 instep work in instep pattern as established sole k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before instep k2tog k1 round 2 work instep in pattern as established k across all sole sts work these 2 rounds 13 times 26 rounds total decreasing 2 sts every other round now there are 38 instep sts and 36 sole sts foot continue instep as established while always knitting the 36 sole sts work until foot is approx 2 inches shorter than desired length toe set-up k1 ssk knit to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 then knit all 36 sole sts now you have 36 instep sts and 36 sole sts toe round 1 decrease round k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of instep k2tog k1 k1 ssk k to 3 sts before end of sole k2tog k1 round 2 plain round k all sts repeat this 2 rounds until there are 36 sts left then always work round 1 until there are 16 sts left this results in a pointy toe if
